title: Two fonts on a poster...
content:
One of the two fonts seem to be a "custom shaded Saracen", but I am not sure at all, and the second one, that for the date... I searched but cannot find what it is. Anyone could help ?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [778539920d72f21e949ba2b6e54707ee.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108094555/http:/typophile.com/files/778539920d72f21e949ba2b6e54707ee.png) | 292.2 KB |
author: charleda

comments.content: I don't know what the original of the shaded typeface is, but it's available digitally as Hominis, by Paul Lloyd.
Wow ! I missed this one ! Thank you a lot !
